title: Pencil on paper Fan-Art drawings
body:
Hey,

I come from the german board and would like to share some art of  friend of mine.
He doesn't play League of Legends, but made some pretty cool drawings about it recently.
Eventhought his Facebook page is all in german, you can vote for a champion to be drawn next below the Nami drawing.
Here is the Link to his page: [Zaphrozz](https://www.facebook.com/Zaphrozz?ref=ts&fref=ts)

Hope you like them as much as I do, enjoy :)
My personal favourite is Renekton right now.

[Tristana](https://www.facebook.com/Zaphrozz/photos/a.427896533900036.91083.207842215905470/848979468458405/?type=1)
[Cassiopeia](https://www.facebook.com/Zaphrozz/photos/a.427896533900036.91083.207842215905470/849026055120413/?type=1)
[Miss Fortune](https://www.facebook.com/Zaphrozz/photos/a.427896533900036.91083.207842215905470/849063308450021/?type=1&theater)
[Renekton](https://www.facebook.com/Zaphrozz/photos/a.427896533900036.91083.207842215905470/849394641750221/?type=1)
[Nami](https://www.facebook.com/Zaphrozz/photos/a.427896533900036.91083.207842215905470/849940618362290/?type=1&theater)

I'd like to add the new drawings directly into the startpost, but the "Add an attachement" option isn't available.
For now I'll add them in the comments.

replies.body: Gorgeous line work! I'm a big fan of the Cass piece. :3
Is that finger on MF covering, err... *something*?

He drew Renekton for me today, hope you like it. Though I owe him a lunch now x)

I get the error, that the pictures fail to load, anyone knows a solution? Tried to reattach them multiple times, but it still doesn't work for me.
As long as it isn't fixed, you can see the pictures by clicking the name of the Champions above.

Edit: works for me now :)
